user.title: Solvis Control Basic Setup
user.description: Please select a name and enter the connection parameters for your Solvis heating system. Before proceeding with the setup, please ensure that the TCP Modbus interface is enabled. You can find instructions on how to do this in the help section.

data_description.name: Name of the system in Home Assistant (freely selectable)
data_description.host: IP address or host name of the Solvis system controller
data_description.port: Modbus port number of the Solvis system controller (usually does not need to be changed)
data_description.mac: MAC address of the Solvis system controller (enter only when prompted: it is detected automatically; manual entry may be necessary, e.g., in Docker environments.)

device.title: System control & polling intervals
device.description: Please select the version of the system control and the time intervals at which the data is to be polled.

data_description.device_version: Version of the central control of the heating system.
data_description.poll_rate_default: Must be a multiple of the high query interval.
data_description.poll_rate_slow: Must be a multiple of the standard query interval.

features.title: Selection of system components
features.description: Please select the assemblies and system components of your Solvis heating system.

data_description.solar collector: Solar collectors SolvisCala Eco, SolvisCala, SolvisFera, SolvisLuna

roomtempsensors.title: Room temperature sensors
roomtempsensors.description: Please select the installed room temperature sensors and their desired behavior.

data_description.hkr1_room_temp_sensor: Select ‘deactivated’ if no sensor is installed, ‘read’ if the value is only to be read out (default) and ‘write’ if the value is to be written.
data_description.hkr2_room_temp_sensor: Select ‘deactivated’ if no sensor is installed, ‘read’ if the value is only to be read out (default) and ‘write’ if the value is to be written.
data_description.hkr3_room_temp_sensor: Select ‘deactivated’ if no sensor is installed, ‘read’ if the value is only to be read out (default) and ‘write’ if the value is to be written.

storage_type.title: Storage type
storage_type.description: Please select the stratified storage type installed in your heating system.

data_description.storage_type: There are SolvisBen and SolvisMax stratified storage tanks. SolvisBen comes in only one size. SolvisMax is available in three sizes (457, 757, 957). Both tanks occur in different configurations that affect storage volume: solo (without heat generator), with heat pump (HP), or hybrid (gas/oil burner AND heat pump). The SolvisMax 957 can additionally be configured in three ways by sensor placement: 82/34/796, 212/34/663, and 301/34/574. In each case, the first number denotes the domestic hot water ready volume (top to S4), the second the heating buffer volume (S4 to S9), and the third the solar buffer volume (S4 to bottom). The chosen tank influences the amount of energy stored, which is determined by the integration.

hkr_names.title: Naming of the heating circuits (optional)
hkr_names.description: If desired, you can assign individual names for the heating circuits as follows. If you want to use the integration’s default names, leave the fields blank.

error.cannot_connect: An error occurred while establishing the Modbus connection.
error.mac_error: Bei der Suche nach der MAC-Adresse ist ein Fehler aufgetreten. Bitte geben Sie diese manuell ein.
error.poll_rate_invalid_slow: The low query interval must be a multiple of the standard query interval.
error.poll_rate_invalid_high: The standard query interval must be a multiple of the high query interval.
error.poll_rate_invalid_order: The standard query interval must be smaller than the low query interval and larger than the high query interval.
error.only_one_temperature_sensor: Only one access variant may be selected for the room temperature sensors (read or write).
